name: Frosty Space
description:
A simple space shooter with frosty elements. There are 3 enemies, the Asteroids, the Hunters, and the Dark Frost. The Dark Frost is only summoned when a certain threshold is crossed. 

This is my first game but I'm very happy it's executable at the very least. There is also a downloadable version, in case you wanted to play it in a higher resolution/quality. I hope you guys enjoyed!

Credits

  • SFX created in as3sfxr
  • Menu Music: Pale Light by Hirokazu Akiyama
  • Game Music: “I'm going home for the time being” by Tamu (TAM)
  • Font: Team 401 by imagex
